headline: Veralto (NYSE:VLTO) Declares US$0.11 Per Share Quarterly Dividend
summary: Veralto (NYSE:VLTO) recently affirmed its commitment to shareholder value through the declaration of a $0.11 per share dividend, payable on April 30, 2025. Despite this positive dividend news, the company's shares saw a 1.1% decline over the past week. This movement aligns with the broader market dynamics, as the Dow Jones and other indices were also under pressure due to tech stock sell-offs and ongoing tariff anxieties. These market-wide concerns, particularly those surrounding tariffs...
